description.value:
An oil that when applied to a metal surface makes it almost frictionless, preventing rust and tarnishing. Can be used to lubricate simple mechanisms. If applied to a weapon, for the next 12 hours or 1d10+4 attacks, reroll any test that would result in a break or jam (must keep new result).

Effect: Scarce

Notes: 12 T
